author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all, as suggested at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47171#issuecomment-2736193038.

#### PR validation:

The branch passes:
   * `addOnTests.py`
   * `runTheMatrix.py -l Run3 --ibeos`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

To be backported to CMSSW_15_0_X for 2025 operations.
title: provide a `fillDescriptions` method for `CondDBESSource`
